panels.description:
Shows the average CPU usage in percent per host for all exporters. An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

Note that the CPU usage is only the CPU usage of the exporter itself. It does not include the additional resource usage that is required to produce metrics by the application or operating system.

See also:
panels.title: Avg CPU Usage per Host

panels.description:
Shows the Exporters average Memory usage per host. An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

Note that the Memory usage is only the Memory usage of the exporter itself. It does not include the additional memory usage that is required to produce metrics by the application or operating system.

See also:
panels.title: Avg Memory Usage per Host

panels.description:
Shows the number of monitored hosts that are running Exporters. An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

See also:
panels.title: Monitored Hosts

panels.description:
Shows the total number of Exporters running with this PMM Server instance. An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

See also:
panels.title: Exporters Running
Prometheus Exporters Resource Usage by Host

panels.description:
Plots the Exporters' CPU usage across each monitored host (by default, All hosts). An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

See also:

targets.expr: (sum(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$host",job!="prometheus",job!="grafana"}[$interval])) by (instance) or sum(irate(process_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$host",job!="prometheus",job!="grafana"}[5m])) by (instance)) / count(node_cpu{mode="user", instance=~"$host"}) by (instance) *100

panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description:
Plots the Exporters' Memory usage across each monitored host (by default, All hosts). An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

See also:
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description:
Shows the Exporters' CPU Cores used for each type of Exporter. An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

See also:
panels.title: CPU Cores Used

panels.description:
Shows the Exporters' memory used for each type of Exporter. An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

See also:
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description:
Show the CPU usage as a percentage for all Exporters on a per-host basis. An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

See also:

targets.expr:
((sum(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$host",job!="prometheus",job!="grafana"}[$interval])) by (instance) 
or sum(irate(process_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$host",job!="prometheus",job!="grafana"}[5m])) by (instance)) 
/ count(node_cpu{instance="$host",mode="user"}) by (instance)*100) or 
sum by () ((max_over_time(node_cpu_average{instance=~"$host", mode="total"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(node_cpu_average{instance=~"$host", mode="total"}[5m])))

panels.title: CPU  Used

panels.description:
Shows total Memory Used by Exporters on a per-host basis. An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

See also:
panels.title: Mem Used

panels.description:
Shows the number of Exporters running on a per-host basis. An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

See also:
panels.title: Exporters Running

panels.description:
Shows the total amount of RAM of the host. An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

See also:
panels.title: RAM

panels.description:
Shows the total number of virtual CPUs on the host. An Exporter is a software library that provides metrics to PMM.

See also:
panels.title: Virtual CPUs
